pages.text: If you want to produce your Grapes more efficiently i recommend to use the Winemaker Set.$(br2)Wearing the full set will give you the ability not to lose any Bone Meal when using it.$(br2)Keep in mind doe, that by using the set bonus the durability will decrease rapidly.

pages.title: Gloves
pages.text: Gloves are a needed Ingredient for crafting the Winemaker Set.$(br2)Winemakers will sell them occassionally.$(br2)If you're lucky, you'll find some left behind Gloves in Villages or maybe a Pillager will be friendly enough to borrow you a Pair?
